title: Web alternative for Avant Garde
content:
Hi all,  
Is there anything similar to Avant Garde for web, perhaps google fonts, font squirrel etc. I also have a typekit account.  
Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content:
[http://www.fonts.com/font/itc/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/web-font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150316060034/http:/www.fonts.com/font/itc/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/web-font "http://www.fonts.com/font/itc/itc-avant-garde-gothic/bold/web-font")

If you want Avant Garde, use Avant Garde. If you don’t care what you use, maybe graphic designer isn’t such a good job for you.
